Grade 8 students from Sampoerna Academy Jakarta have developed “Wintint,” a smart window that utilizes PDLC (Polymer Dispersed Liquid Crystal) film technology to seamlessly adjust its opacity via an app. This innovative solution addresses critical issues like light pollution, energy consumption, and privacy.

This remarkable project showcases these young innovators ability to tackle real-world challenges, apply scientific principles, and collaborate effectively to deliver impactful solutions. It also reflects the transformative power of STEAM education in nurturing the leaders of tomorrow.
